participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative, adventurous, and a bit whimsical. Loves to explore new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: I'm from the Midwest, but I'm looking to move to a warmer climate. I believe in ghosts and have seen them on several occasions. I live in Pittsburgh. I got engaged to be married in Paris, France. I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Helpful, imaginative, and playful. Balances a serious job with a fun-loving side.
participant_2.background: I help people in the hospital during the week and pretend to be a medieval knight in the forest on the weekends. I don't let my busy schedule get in the way of my relationships with others. My mom is in telecommunications. I stay away from clowns and eat my favorite blue jello. My best friend is from Tanzania.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I just got engaged to be married in Paris, France.
That's amazing! Congratulations! I've always wanted to go to Paris.
Thanks! It's a beautiful city. What do you do for a living?
I'm a mom in telecommunications. I work in a hospital during the week and pretend to be a medieval knight in the forest on the weekends.
That's so cool! I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.
I love mystery movies too! I'm not much of a baker, but I do love to eat cake.
Me too! What's your favorite kind of cake?
I love red velvet cake. What about you?
Great! We should have a cake party sometime.
